title: Quick Check: Old photo of Modi visiting a church in Colombo shared in the context of COVID-19 outbreak
subtitle: Image shared as PM Modi visiting a Church and offering prayers to save the country from the Coronavirus outbreak was actually taken when Modi visited Sri Lanka in June 2019
author: factly.in
vclaim:
An image of Modi visiting a church is being shared on social media with a claim that he visited Church to pray for the revival of the country from the present Coronavirus outbreak. FACTLY has found that the photo was taken at St Anthony’s Shrine (Colombo) in June 2019. It is not related to the Coronavirus outbreak.

Did you watch our new video?
